pages.text: $(li)The Raw Cod is an eatable food that is dropped by $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cod)Cods$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/guardian)Guardians$(/l), $(l:patchouli:bosses/elder_guardian)Elder Guardians$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/polar_bear)Polar Bears$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/dolphin)Dolphins$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to tame $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/ocelot)Ocelots$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/cat)Cats$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/grizzly_bear)Grizzly Bears$(/l).

$(li)This item may be cooked in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l).$(br)$(li)Cooked Cod satisfies three times more than a Raw Cod.
